verses.verse: אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> These מַסְעֵ֣י <WH4550> These [are] the journeys בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יָצְא֛וּ <WH3318> which went forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> with their armies בְּיַד־ <WH3027> under the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> and Aaron

וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> wrote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹצָאֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4161> their goings out לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> according to their journeys עַל־ <WH5921> by פִּ֣י <WH6310> by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> and these מַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> and these [are] their journeys לְמוֹצָאֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4161> according to their goings out

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵֽרַעְמְסֵס֙ <WH7486> from Rameses בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> in the first בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> of the first מִֽמָּחֳרַ֣ת <WH4283> on the morrow הַפֶּ֗סַח <WH6453> after the passover יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> went out בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand רָמָ֔ה <WH7311> with an high לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian

וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4713> Egyptian מְקַבְּרִ֗ים <WH6912> buried אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> had smitten יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD בָּהֶ֖ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּכ֑וֹר <WH1060> all [their] firstborn וּבֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> among them upon their gods עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> executed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> also the LORD שְׁפָטִֽים׃ <WH8201> judgments
וַיִּסְע֥וּ <WH5265> removed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵרַעְמְסֵ֑ס <WH7486> from Rameses וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּסֻכֹּֽת׃ <WH5523> in Succoth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <WH5523> from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> in Etham אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בִּקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> which [is] in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they removed מֵֽאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> from Etham וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> and turned again עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֣י הַחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> unto Pihahiroth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בַּ֣עַל צְפ֑וֹן <WH1189> which [is] before Baalzephon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and they pitched לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מִגְדֹּֽל׃ <WH4024> Migdol

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they departed מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <WH6367> Pihahiroth וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> and passed through בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> of the sea הַמִּדְבָּ֑רָה <WH4057> into the wilderness וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> went דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> three יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days' בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness אֵתָ֔ם <WH864> of Etham וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּמָרָֽה׃ <WH4785> in Marah

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> And they removed מִמָּרָ֔ה <WH4785> from Marah וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came אֵילִ֑מָה <WH362> unto Elim וּ֠בְאֵילִם <WH362> and in Elim שְׁתֵּ֣ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֞ה <WH6240> ten עֵינֹ֥ת <WH5869> fountains מַ֛יִם <WH4325> of water וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֖ים <WH8558> palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <WH2583> and they pitched שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵאֵילִ֑ם <WH362> from Elim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> and יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> by the Red
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִיַּם־ <WH3220> sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> from the Red וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness סִֽין׃ <WH5512> of Sin
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they took their journey מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> out of the wilderness סִ֑ין <WH5512> of Sin וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּדָפְקָֽה׃ <WH1850> in Dophkah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִדָּפְקָ֑ה <WH1850> from Dophkah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּאָלֽוּשׁ׃ <WH442> in Alush

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵאָל֑וּשׁ <WH442> from Alush וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and encamped בִּרְפִידִ֔ם <WH7508> at Rephidim וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> had שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> now it was there מַ֛יִם <WH4325> where was no water לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> for the people לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> to drink
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵרְפִידִ֑ם <WH7508> from Rephidim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> of Sinai
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> from the desert סִינָ֑י <WH5514> of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּקִבְרֹ֥ת הַֽתַּאֲוָֽה׃ <WH6914> at Kibrothhattaavah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִקִּבְרֹ֣ת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH6914> from Kibrothhattaavah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בַּחֲצֵרֹֽת׃ <WH2698> at Hazeroth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵחֲצֵרֹ֑ת <WH2698> from Hazeroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּרִתְמָֽה׃ <WH7575> in Rithmah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵרִתְמָ֑ה <WH7575> from Rithmah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּרִמֹּ֥ן פָּֽרֶץ׃ <WH7428> at Rimmonparez
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵרִמֹּ֣ן פָּ֑רֶץ <WH7428> from Rimmonparez וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּלִבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> in Libnah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִלִּבְנָ֑ה <WH3841> from Libnah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּרִסָּֽה׃ <WH7446> at Rissah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they journeyed מֵרִסָּ֑ה <WH7446> from Rissah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בִּקְהֵלָֽתָה׃ <WH6954> in Kehelathah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they went מִקְּהֵלָ֑תָה <WH6954> from Kehelathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּהַר־ <WH2022> in mount שָֽׁפֶר׃ <WH8234> Shapher
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵֽהַר־ <WH2022> from mount שָׁ֑פֶר <WH8234> Shapher וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בַּחֲרָדָֽה׃ <WH2732> in Haradah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵחֲרָדָ֑ה <WH2732> from Haradah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּמַקְהֵלֹֽת׃ <WH4722> in Makheloth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִמַּקְהֵלֹ֑ת <WH4722> from Makheloth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּתָֽחַת׃ <WH8480> at Tahath
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִתָּ֑חַת <WH8480> from Tahath וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּתָֽרַח׃ <WH8646> at Tarah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִתָּ֑רַח <WH8646> from Tarah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּמִתְקָֽה׃ <WH4989> in Mithcah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they went מִמִּתְקָ֑ה <WH4989> from Mithcah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּחַשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH2832> in Hashmonah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵֽחַשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <WH2832> from Hashmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּמֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH4149> at Moseroth
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִמֹּסֵר֑וֹת <WH4149> from Moseroth וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בִּבְנֵ֥י יַעֲקָֽן׃ <WH1142> in Benejaakan
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִבְּנֵ֣י יַעֲקָ֑ן <WH1142> from Benejaakan וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּחֹ֥ר הַגִּדְגָּֽד׃ <WH2735> at Horhagidgad
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they went מֵחֹ֣ר הַגִּדְגָּ֑ד <WH2735> from Horhagidgad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּיָטְבָֽתָה׃ <WH3193> in Jotbathah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִיָּטְבָ֑תָה <WH3193> from Jotbathah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּעַבְרֹנָֽה׃ <WH5684> at Ebronah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵֽעַבְרֹנָ֑ה <WH5684> from Ebronah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּעֶצְי֥וֹן גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH6100> at Eziongaber

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵעֶצְי֣וֹן גָּ֑בֶר <WH6100> from Eziongaber וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness צִ֖ן <WH6790> of Zin הִ֥וא <WH1931> that קָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> which [is] Kadesh

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִקָּדֵ֑שׁ <WH6946> from Kadesh וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched בְּהֹ֣ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> in mount בִּקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> in the edge אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Edom

וַיַּעַל֩ <WH5927> went up אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> And Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest אֶל־ <WH413> about הֹ֥ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֛ר <WH2022> into mount עַל־ <WH5921> at פִּ֥י <WH6310> at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> and died שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year הָֽאַרְבָּעִ֗ים <WH705> there in the fortieth לְצֵ֤את <WH3318> were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> after the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֖י <WH2549> [day] of the fifth בְּאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> in the first לַחֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH2320> month

וְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> And Aaron בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שָׁלֹ֧שׁ <WH7969> and three וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> and twenty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [was] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years בְּמֹת֖וֹ <WH4194> when he died בְּהֹ֥ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> in mount ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> heard הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> the Canaanite מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king עֲרָ֔ד <WH6166> Arad וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> who יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> which dwelt בַּנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> in the south בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בְּבֹ֖א <WH935> of the coming בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵהֹ֣ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> from mount וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּצַלְמֹנָֽה׃ <WH6758> in Zalmonah
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִצַּלְמֹנָ֑ה <WH6758> from Zalmonah וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּפוּנֹֽן׃ <WH6325> in Punon
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מִפּוּנֹ֑ן <WH6325> from Punon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <WH88> in Oboth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵאֹבֹ֑ת <WH88> from Oboth וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעִיֵּ֥י הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <WH5863> in Ijeabarim בִּגְב֥וּל <WH1366> in the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵעִיִּ֑ים <WH5864> from Iim וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּדִיבֹ֥ן <WH1769> in Dibongad גָּֽד׃ <WH1410> Gad
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מִדִּיבֹ֣ן <WH1769> from Dibongad גָּ֑ד <WH1410> Gad וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְּעַלְמֹ֥ן דִּבְלָתָֽיְמָה׃ <WH5963> in Almondiblathaim

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they removed מֵעַלְמֹ֣ן דִּבְלָתָ֑יְמָה <WH5963> from Almondiblathaim וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּהָרֵ֥י <WH2022> in the mountains הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <WH5682> of Abarim לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before נְבֽוֹ׃ <WH5015> Nebo

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they departed מֵהָרֵ֣י <WH2022> from the mountains הָעֲבָרִ֑ים <WH5682> of Abarim וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab עַ֖ל <WH5921> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> [near] Jericho

וַיַּחֲנ֤וּ <WH2583> And they pitched עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> by Jordan מִבֵּ֣ית הַיְשִׁמֹ֔ת <WH1020> from Bethjesimoth עַ֖ד <WH5704> far אָבֵ֣ל הַשִּׁטִּ֑ים <WH63> [even] unto Abelshittim בְּעַֽרְבֹ֖ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> by Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> [near] Jericho לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> to כִּ֥י <WH3588> When אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> unto them When ye are passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וְה֨וֹרַשְׁתֶּ֜ם <WH3423> Then ye shall drive out אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> all the inhabitants הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before וְאִ֨בַּדְתֶּ֔ם <WH6> you and destroy אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַשְׂכִּיֹּתָ֑ם <WH4906> all their pictures וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all צַלְמֵ֤י <WH6754> images מַסֵּֽכֹתָם֙ <WH4541> all their molten תְּאַבֵּ֔דוּ <WH6> and destroy וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּמֹתָ֖ם <WH1116> all their high places תַּשְׁמִֽידוּ׃ <WH8045> and quite pluck down

וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֥ם <WH3423> And ye shall dispossess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> [the inhabitants] of the land וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <WH3427> and dwell בָּ֑הּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לָכֶ֛ם נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> therein for I have given אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> you the land לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וְהִתְנַחַלְתֶּם֩ <WH5157> for an inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּגוֹרָ֜ל <WH1486> by lot לְמִשְׁפְּחֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH4940> among your families לָרַ֞ב <WH7227> [and] to the more תַּרְבּ֤וּ <WH7235> ye shall give the more אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתוֹ֙ <WH5159> inheritance וְלַמְעַט֙ <WH4592> and to the fewer תַּמְעִ֣יט <WH4591> ye shall give the less אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> inheritance אֶל֩ <WH413> about אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יֵ֨צֵא <WH3318> falleth ל֥וֹ שָׁ֛מָּה <WH8033> in it הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> every man's [inheritance] shall be in the place where his lot ל֣וֹ יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become לְמַטּ֥וֹת <WH4294> according to the tribes אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers תִּתְנֶחָֽלוּ׃ <WH5157> ye shall inherit

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> not תוֹרִ֜ישׁוּ <WH3423> But if ye will not drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶם֒ <WH6440> from before וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall come אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom תּוֹתִ֣ירוּ <WH3498> you then it shall come to pass that those which ye let remain מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> of them as לְשִׂכִּים֙ <WH7899> of them [shall be] pricks בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> in your eyes וְלִצְנִינִ֖ם <WH6796> and thorns בְּצִדֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH6654> in your sides וְצָרֲר֣וּ <WH6887> and shall vex אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> in הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> you in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> wherein ye dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and דִּמִּ֛יתִי <WH1819> unto you as I thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> Moreover it shall come to pass [that] I shall do לָהֶ֖ם אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> to do לָכֶֽם׃ פ
